headline: Evernorth’s Onsite Clinics and AI Cardiac Care Might Change The Case For Investing In Cigna Group (CI)
summary: Hankook Tire America Corp. recently opened the Hankook Tire Clinic Powered by Evernorth at its Clarksville, Tennessee plant, offering onsite preventive, primary, chronic care and select occupational health services with low or no out-of-pocket costs for employees and eligible family members. This clinic, together with Cigna’s role in covering advanced AI-based cardiovascular imaging, highlights how the Evernorth platform is being used to embed healthcare services and technology directly into...

headline: 1 S&P 500 Stock to Research Further and 2 We Avoid
summary: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) is often seen as a benchmark for strong businesses, but that doesn’t mean every stock is worth owning. Some companies face significant challenges, whether it’s stagnating growth, heavy debt, or disruptive new competitors.
